Posts.Content: Birder wrote: I am scheduled for lumpectomy next week. I have moderate COPD but have only needed oxygen to sleep until now but surgeon said I will almost certainly need oxygen 24/7 for a time after surgery. Has any with copd had a lumpectomy-and what was your experience with need for additional oxygen? Did anyone without copd need oxygen after lumpectomy? Dx 12/2014, IDC, 1cm, Stage IB, Grade 3, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 1/28/2015 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need for increased oxygen for those with copd after lumpectomy Birder Birder
